text.p: LL&E Royalty Trust on Monday estimated its December income distribution at about $.0540 per unit, payable on December 13 to holders of record December 5.
That compares with from $0.045 paid November 15.
The December distribution of about $1,026,000 represents amounts payable to the trust from oil and natural gas production in the month of September.
LL&E said the distribution includes no proceeds from offshore Louisiana because of excess production costs totaling $57,000 for the month.
Also, the distribution includes no proceeds from Fort Worth Basin activities. A total of $13,700 in excess production costs still needed to be recouped from future Fort Worth proceeds.
